code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{auth}=useContext(AuthContext);if(auth.loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(!auth.isLoggedIn||auth.user.role!=='admin'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Access Denied"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You do not have permission to view this page."})]});}return children;};export default AdminRoute;
